Michelle Baruchman

Michelle Baruchman is politics news and enterprise reporter covering statewide political stories.

Greg Bluestein

Greg Bluestein is a political reporter who covers the governor's office and Georgia politics.

Jim Denery

Jim Denery is a premium editor who mostly handles stories involving Georgia politics and government.

Chris Joyner

Joyner has been with the AJC since 2010 as a member of the investigations and politics team.

Natalie Mendenhall

Only the radio could play Natalie Mendenhall, and she uses the medium to her benefit.

Tia Mitchell

Tia Mitchell is the AJC’s Washington correspondent.

Patricia Murphy

Patricia Murphy joined the AJC in 2020 from CQ Roll Call, where she was a nationally syndicated political columnist.

Mark Niesse

Mark Niesse covers voting rights and elections for The Atlanta Journal-Constitution.

Bill Nigut

Bill Nigut is a co-host of the AJC Politically Georgia live radio show and podcast.

Susan Potter

Susan Potter has been overseeing political coverage at the AJC for more than a decade.

Maya T. Prabhu

Maya T. Prabhu is a government reporter for The Atlanta Journal-Constitution.

Alex Sanz

Alex Sanz is a veteran journalist and senior news leader at The Atlanta Journal-Constitution.

David Wickert

David Wickert covers transportation issues and state government.
